item.description:
Boston's best young professionals New Year's Eve event 14 years running.

Friday, December 31, 2010

Seaport Boston Hotel
7:30 pm to 2am
Featuring The Felix Brown Band and DJ Samual L.

What is included:
Multiple options including the following:
All inclusibe Dinner - 7:30 PM - 2 AM
Reception only - 8:30 PM - 2 AM
Party only - 9:30 PM - 2 AM

As the clock strikes midnight, ring in 2010 with tons of party favors and a countdown celebration on huge video displays! VIP goody bag is filled with items from our sponsors.

Cost:
Prices started at $154 for Dinner, $94 for the Reception only, and $64 for the Party only, but are increasing as we get closer to the event. The first price cutoff point is October 31. See The Boston Event Guide's website for details. Resolution Ball 2011

** Get an extra $10 off the prevailing ticket price by using the "Coupon code": NYEVIP

Robyn and several of our other members who went last year have already made their reservations because we had such a great time!
item.name: New Year's Resolution Ball 2011
